corpus_description: Open-access writings and research by Elinor Ostrom on commons governance, collective action, and institutional analysis (1965-2012)

sources.title: Sustaining the Commons
sources.description: Undergraduate textbook covering Ostrom's frameworks, 8 design principles, IAD framework, and case studies. Based on her work with co-authors.

sources.title: Beyond Markets and States: Polycentric Governance of Complex Economic Systems
sources.description: Nobel Prize lecture summarizing her life's work on polycentric governance and self-organization in commons management.

sources.title: Updated Guide to IAD and the Language of the Ostrom Workshop
sources.description: Comprehensive guide to the Institutional Analysis and Development (IAD) framework developed by Vincent and Elinor Ostrom.

sources.title: A General Framework for Analyzing Sustainability of Social-Ecological Systems
sources.description: Introduces the Social-Ecological Systems (SES) framework with 10 subsystem variables affecting self-organization.
sources.license: Paywalled (check institutional access or author manuscript)

sources.title: The Struggle to Govern the Commons
sources.description: Overview of adaptive governance approaches for managing commons at multiple scales.

sources.title: Background on the Institutional Analysis and Development Framework
sources.description: Ostrom's own summary of the IAD framework's development and application.
